Theme Settings & Portlet Decorators

Theme Settings

Legacy theme provide several theme setting that allow you to custom your site.

Bellow, you can see the different customizable options:

Color Schemes

There are no limited Color Schemes. This theme provide many colorpikers which you can use to custom many colors:

Setting Description Type Default Configurable
Brand Color Main color of the site. It is used for color letter of many elements and brackgrounds. Text - ColorPicker #1d628b Yes
Brand Color Text When an element has Brand Color as background, it letter color will be this. Text - ColorPicker #ffffff Yes
Gray-Base The main color for most elements of the site. For example, it is used for letter color body, many headers and others elements. Text - ColorPicker #444444 Yes

Breadcrumbs

You can choose if Breadcrumbs will show or not in your site, even you can choose it per page.

Setting Description Type Default Configurable
Show Breadcrumbs Show breadcryumbs or not Checkbox false Yes

Header

You can choose between 2 types of header

Type 1

Type 2

Also, you can choose if you want that your header fill all the window width or just use a container. This settings correspond with bootstrap class, container and container-fluid applied to the header.

Setting Description Type Default Configurable
Header Type Choose between 2 types of header Select Full Width Header Yes
Header Fluid or Not Fluid Choose between a container fluid or container for your header Select Header Fluid Yes

Container

You can choose if you want that your content fill all the window width or just use a container. This settings correspond with Bootstrap 3 classes, container and container-fluid applied to the content.

Setting Description Type Default Configurable
Container Fluid or Not Fluid Choose between a container fluid or container for your content Select Container Fluid Yes

Footer Links

First, you can choose the pages you want to show in the footer. You just have to type the parent URL of the links, for example: /footer .

Social Networks

Legacy Theme define 6 social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Youtube, Instagram and Google Plus.

You can choose which social network have to show and which not. Also, you can type the URLs of each social network, these URLs will be applied to the footer social links.

Setting Description Type Default Configurable
Footer Links Choose the pages tree that you want tu use as footer links Text /footer Yes
Show Facebook Link Include facebook link or not Checkbox true Yes
Facebook Link URL of your facebook profile Text http://www.facebook.com Yes
Show Twitter Link Include twitter link or not Checkbox true Yes
Twitter Link URL of your twitter profile Text http://www.twitter.com Yes
Show Instagram Link Include instagram link or not Checkbox true Yes
Instagram Link URL of your instagram profile Text http://www.instagram.com Yes
Show Linkedin Link Include linkedin link or not Checkbox true Yes
Linkedin Link URL of your linkedin profile Text http://www.linkedin.com Yes
Show Youtube Link Include youtube link or not Checkbox true Yes
Youtube Link URL of your youtube profile Text http://www.youtube.com Yes
Show Google Plus Link Include google plus link or not Checkbox true Yes
Google Plus Link URL of your google plus profile Text https://plus.google.com Yes
